text:
Does anybody if it's possible to have multiple sitemap on HubSpot.
I want to create a specific sitemap for Google News for example so the HubSpot native sitemap is not good.
I created a script with PHP that generate my specific sitemap but I don't know how to put it on my HubSpot domain... Any ideas ?
you wont be able to add php onto HubSpot itself, from what I know, you can't add additional sitemaps though I am wondering if you added this to the DM as a coded file if you may be able to do this
then in search console "add a sitemap" and use that url of the coded file in DM
